name: trigger-search
description: Proof of concept of trigger maintained search tables

scripts.load-test: npm run load-test-operation && npm run load-test-search
scripts.db-init: npm run db-up-structure && npm run db-up-triggers && npm run db-up-view && npm run db-seed -- 0
scripts.db-destroy: npm run db-down-triggers && npm run db-down-view && npm run db-down-structure
scripts.test:full: npm run db-destroy && npm run db-init && npm test && npm run db-seed -- 2 && npm run load-test && npm run report

author: Matt Forster
